Concrete Wall Volume Calculator

Calculate the concrete volume needed for a rectangular concrete wall based on length, height, and thickness.

Concrete Volume: — cubic feet Total concrete volume required for the wall.
Concrete Volume: — cubic yards Total concrete volume required for the wall in cubic yards.

How this calculator works

This calculator multiplies wall length, height, and thickness to determine total concrete volume.

When to use this calculator

Use this calculator when estimating concrete for foundation walls, retaining walls, or similar structures.
